semester.description1: You will learn the  basic principles for the design and programming of digital solutions, with a particular focus on the design and structuring of the user interface, including user-centred methods for design and solution testing.
semester.outcomePoints1:
• Development methods for digital media production.
  • Key technologies applied, including client-server relations.
  • Plan and conduct user tests.
  • Document key processes in the design and development.
semester.competencesA: • participate in interdisciplinary work processes in connection with the design and development of digital user interfaces
semester.slogan2: How to tell us your story
semester.description2: You will learn how to design, programming and product a simple digital content solution for selected media platforms.  Solutions are designed, programmed and produced on the basis of a content and business strategy.
semester.outcomePoints2:
• Understanding of intellectual property rights and licensing methods.
  • Digital media and digital media platforms.
  • Key forms of expression and content.
  • Basic methods and theories regarding user understanding.
  • Empirical data about users.
semester.competencesB: • participate in interdisciplinary work processes in connection with the design and development of digital content

semester.slogan: Create a design experience that people will never forget
semester.description1: You will learn how design and programming of complex digital solutions with a special focus on user interfaces. Solutions are designed and programmed in teams using key methods for testing the user experience.
semester.outcomePoints1:
• Understanding of the company’s external environment.
  • Theories, tools and methods for the design and programming of digital user experiences.
  • Current programming paradigms for complex digital user interfaces.
  • Plan and assess project management in team-based
  • Communicate and explain solutions.
semester.competencesA: • Identify relevant theories, methods and tools for the execution of complex digital media productions
semester.slogan2: Take your digital content creation to the next level
semester.description2: You will learn how to  design and programming of complex digital content solutions for multiple types of media. In the production of content, technologies are applied to manage and present content, and communication of data forms.
semester.outcomePoints2:
• Methods and theories applied for complex digital content production.
  • Methods and theories applied for the presentation of data.
  • Key methods and theories of digital user experiences.
  • Communicate and justify digital solutions.
semester.competencesB:
• Identify relevant theories, methods and tools for the production of complex digital content in teams.
  • Acquire new skills, knowledge and competencies within the design and production of complex digital context

semester.description1: This semester is organised taking into account local / regional needs and must include electives related to at least 5 ECTS points.
semester.slogan2: You will be able to choose between:
semester.electives:
• Option 1: Digital Design og Indhold (taught in Danish)
  • Option 2: Persuasive Content (taught in English)
  • Option 3: FrontEnd Design (taught in English)

semester.slogan: Time to Practice! In real life!
semester.description1: This is the semester that you will have your Internship  in multimedia design field, equal to 15 ETCS.
semester.description2: The learning objectives for the final exam project are identical to the learning objectives for the programme. This exam will take place in the end of this semester when all other exams have been passed with a equal a 15 ETCS.
